sk1.name: Viscous Nasal Goo
sk1.desc: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed. Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.

sk2.name: Quill Spray
sk2.desc: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback. Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14 seconds.

sk3.name: Bristleback
sk3.desc: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear. If Bristleback takes 250 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.

sk4.name: Warpath
sk4.desc: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.
